document_data.name: Tamr na-Fia
document_data.mainbody: '''Tamr na-Fia''' lived in the [[Tower of Adnan al-Raqi]] in [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{cite book/City of Delights/Gem of Zakhara|62}}
document_data.Relationships: Tamr was the favorite student of [[Adnan al-Raqi]], who looked upon her as his own granddaughter.
document_data.Activities: Tamr disappeared after she was sent to the court of one of the [[genie]] lords at the request of Adnan to find answers to the [[Khalil al-Assad al-Zahir|Grand Caliph's]] sterility. He kept her private quarters ready for her in case she ever returned.
